languages.text: {n}Голос Ульфара становится уклончив.{/n} "Он спас нашего брата, который потерял стаю и... Не мог позаботиться о себе и чести Ордена. Вернул его на Фенрис и сохранил в тайне несчастье, постигшее его. Ярл знал, что вела его жажда выгоды и желание обрести могучих должников, однако честь обязала его принять чужака гостеприимно и поклясться в дружбе".

{n}Ulfar's voice turns cagey.{/n} "He saved our brother who had lost the pack and... was unable to look after himself or the Chapter's honour. Calcazar returned our brother to Fenris and kept secret the misfortune that had befallen him. The jarl knew that the Inquisitor's actions were driven by opportunism and the desire to have us mighty warriors in his debt, but honour forced him to be hospitable to the stranger and swear an oath of friendship."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Ульфара становится уклончив.{/n} "Он спас нашего брата, который потерял стаю и... Не мог позаботиться о себе и чести Ордена. Вернул его на Фенрис и сохранил в тайне несчастье, постигшее его. Ярл знал, что вела его жажда выгоды и желание обрести могучих должников, однако честь обязала его принять чужака гостеприимно и поклясться в дружбе".

languages.text: {n}La voz de Ulfar se vuelve esquiva.{/n} «Salvó a nuestro hermano, que había perdido a su jauría y... era incapaz de cuidar de sí mismo y del honor del Capítulo. Calcazar trajo a nuestro hermano a Fenris y ocultó su infortunio. El jarl sabía que las acciones del Inquisidor estaban motivadas por el oportunismo de tener a nuestros guerreros en deuda con él, pero el honor le obligaba a ser hospitalario y prestar un juramento de amistad con el desconocido».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns cagey.{/n} "He saved our brother who had lost the pack and... was unable to look after himself or the Chapter's honour. Calcazar returned our brother to Fenris and kept secret the misfortune that had befallen him. The jarl knew that the Inquisitor's actions were driven by opportunism and the desire to have us mighty warriors in his debt, but honour forced him to be hospitable to the stranger and swear an oath of friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Ulfar se vuelve esquiva.{/n} «Salvó a nuestro hermano, que había perdido a su jauría y... era incapaz de cuidar de sí mismo y del honor de la orden. Calcazar trajo a nuestro hermano a Fenris y ocultó su infortunio. El jarl sabía que las acciones del Inquisidor estaban motivadas por el oportunismo de tener a nuestros guerreros en deuda con él, pero el honor le obligaba a ser hospitalario y prestar un juramento de amistad con el desconocido».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法的声音变得充满戒心。{/n}“他救了我们离群的兄弟，那位兄弟他……无力照顾自己，也无力保全战团的荣誉。卡尔卡扎把那位兄弟送回了芬里斯，没对任何人说出他不幸的遭遇。我们的领主很清楚，审判官的行为是在投机取巧，想让我们这些强大的战士欠他个人情，但出于荣誉，他不得不对那位陌生人以礼相待，宣誓建立友谊。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns cagey.{/n} "He saved our brother who had lost the pack and... was unable to look after himself or the Chapter's honour. Calcazar returned our brother to Fenris and kept secret the misfortune that had befallen him. The jarl knew that the Inquisitor's actions were driven by opportunism and the desire to have us mighty warriors in his debt, but honour forced him to be hospitable to the stranger and swear an oath of friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法的声音变得充满戒心。{/n}“他救了我们离群的兄弟，那位兄弟他……无力照顾自己，也无力保全军团的荣誉。卡尔卡扎把那位兄弟送回了芬里斯，没对任何人说出他不幸的遭遇。我们的领主很清楚，审判官的行为是在投机取巧，想让我们这些强大的战士欠他个人情，但出于荣誉，他不得不对那位陌生人以礼相待，宣誓建立友谊。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーはあまり話したくなさそうに言う。{/n}「彼は群れを失った俺の兄弟を救ってくれたんだ…自分自身や戦団の名誉を守ることのできなかった者たちをな。カルカサルは兄弟をフェンリスに連れ戻し、彼に降りかかった不幸については秘密にしてくれた。ヤールは異端審問官の行動はご都合主義と、我々強力な戦士に貸しを作りたいという欲望からのものであることは知っていた。だが彼は名誉を守るため、その見知らぬ者をもてなし、友の誓いをたてた」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns cagey.{/n} "He saved our brother who had lost the pack and... was unable to look after himself or the Chapter's honour. Calcazar returned our brother to Fenris and kept secret the misfortune that had befallen him. The jarl knew that the Inquisitor's actions were driven by opportunism and the desire to have us mighty warriors in his debt, but honour forced him to be hospitable to the stranger and swear an oath of friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーはあまり話したくなさそうに言う。{/n}「彼は群れを失った俺の兄弟を救ってくれたんだ…自分自身やウルフの名誉を守ることのできなかった者たちをな。カルカサルは兄弟をフェンリスに連れ戻し、彼に降りかかった不幸については秘密にしてくれた。ヤールは異端審問官の行動はご都合主義と、我々強力な戦士に貸しを作りたいという欲望からのものであることは知っていた。だが彼は名誉を守るため、その見知らぬ者をもてなし、友の誓いをたてた」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar reprend la parole d'une voix évasive.{/n} « Il a sauvé l'un de nos frères qui avait été séparé de la meute et... qui s'était avéré incapable de prendre soin de lui-même et de faire honneur à notre Chapitre. Calcazar l'a ramené sur Fenris et s'est engagé à ne jamais divulguer le secret de son infortune. Le jarl savait que l'inquisiteur agissait par opportunisme et qu'il cherchait à ce que nos preux guerriers lui soient redevables, mais l'honneur l'a contraint à faire preuve d'hospitalité envers cet étranger et à sceller avec lui un pacte d'amitié. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns cagey.{/n} "He saved our brother who had lost the pack and... was unable to look after himself or the Chapter's honour. Calcazar returned our brother to Fenris and kept secret the misfortune that had befallen him. The jarl knew that the Inquisitor's actions were driven by opportunism and the desire to have us mighty warriors in his debt, but honour forced him to be hospitable to the stranger and swear an oath of friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar reprend la parole d'une voix évasive.{/n} « Il a sauvé l'un de nos frères qui avait été séparé de la meute et... qui s'était avéré incapable de prendre soin de lui-même et de faire honneur à notre ordre. Calcazar l'a ramené sur Fenris et s'est engagé à ne jamais divulguer le secret de son infortune. Le jarl savait que l'inquisiteur agissait par opportunisme et qu'il cherchait à ce que nos preux guerriers lui soient redevables, mais l'honneur l'a contraint à faire preuve d'hospitalité envers cet étranger et à sceller avec lui un pacte d'amitié. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfars Stimme nimmt einen ausweichenden Ton an.{/n} "Er hat unseren Bruder gerettet, der das Rudel verloren hatte, und ... weder sich selbst noch auf die Ehre des Ordens schützen konnte. Calcazar hat unseren Bruder nach Fenris zurückgebracht und geheim gehalten, welches Unglück ihn befallen hatte. Der Jarl wusste, dass das Handeln des Inquisitors von Opportunismus getrieben war, von dem Wunsch, uns mächtige Krieger in seiner Schuld stehen zu haben. Doch die Ehre zwang den Jarl, dem Fremden gegenüber gastfreundlich zu sein und einen Eid der Freundschaft zu leisten."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns cagey.{/n} "He saved our brother who had lost the pack and... was unable to look after himself or the Chapter's honour. Calcazar returned our brother to Fenris and kept secret the misfortune that had befallen him. The jarl knew that the Inquisitor's actions were driven by opportunism and the desire to have us mighty warriors in his debt, but honour forced him to be hospitable to the stranger and swear an oath of friendship."

Calcazar hat unseren Bruder nach Fenris zurückgebracht und geheim gehalten, welches Unglück ihn befallen hatte. Der Jarl wusste, dass das Handeln des Inquisitors von Opportunismus getrieben war, von dem Wunsch, uns mächtige Krieger in seiner Schuld stehen zu haben. Doch die Ehre zwang den Jarl, dem Fremden gegenüber gastfreundlich zu sein und einen Eid der Freundschaft zu leisten."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, tedbirli bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Sürüsünü kaybetmiş, Tümen'in şanını düşünemeyen ve kendi başının çaresine bakamayan bir kardeşimize yardım etti. Calcazar, kardeşimizi Fenris'e geri getirdi ve onun başına gelen talihsizliği kimseye anlatmadı. Yarl, Engizisyoncu'nun bunu eline geçen kozu kaybetmemek ve bizim gibi güçlü savaşçıları kendine borçlu bırakmak için yaptığını biliyordu. Fakat şerefi, onu bu yabancıya karşı ılımlı olmaya ve dostluk yemini etmeye mecbur bıraktı."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns cagey.{/n} "He saved our brother who had lost the pack and... was unable to look after himself or the Chapter's honour. Calcazar returned our brother to Fenris and kept secret the misfortune that had befallen him. The jarl knew that the Inquisitor's actions were driven by opportunism and the desire to have us mighty warriors in his debt, but honour forced him to be hospitable to the stranger and swear an oath of friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar tedbirli bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Sürüsünü kaybetmiş, Tümen'in şanını düşünemeyen ve kendi başının çaresine bakamayan bir kardeşimize yardım etti. Calcazar, kardeşimizi Fenris'e geri getirdi ve onun başına gelen talihsizliği kimseye anlatmadı. Jarl, Engizisyoncu'nun bunu eline geçen kozu kaybetmemek ve bizim gibi güçlü savaşçıları kendine borçlu bırakmak için yaptığını biliyordu. Fakat şerefi, onu bu yabancıya karşı ılımlı davranmak ve dostluk yemini etmek zorunda bıraktı."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
